trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Garner
There were no other sightings in Garner on or around December 28th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was taking the trash to the street,and it was around 7:35pm EST and I looked up in the SW sky and noticed a shooting star coming down really fast. This was the first one I have seen. After that, I looked up again and saw a ball of light-which resembled a sphere. It was moving SE and then all of sudden, it blinked and in it's place, there were two objects that moved in opposite directions, one continued moving SE and then the other went NW. Did anyone else see this?
